column1:
Just a heads up for fellow Aussies in NSW. 
Pharmacies have free N95 facemasks (adult & kids sizes) available. 
Ostensibly for dealing with smoke from  #AustralianBushfires - but handy to have considering  events in Wuhan & if #coronavirus makes it here

https://www.health.nsw.gov.au/news/Pages/20200115_00.aspx …pic.twitter.com/4iEmIT2LAI
